edu.sru.thangiah.zeus.metaheuristics.simulatedannealing
Class SimulatedAnnealing

java.lang.Object
  edu.sru.thangiah.zeus.metaheuristics.simulatedannealing.SimulatedAnnealing
Direct Known Subclasses:
TabuSimulatedAnnealing
public class SimulatedAnnealing
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation of the Simulated Annealing Meta-Heuristic

Title: SimulatedAnnealing

Description: Implementation of the Simulated Annealing Meta-Heuristic See http://members.aol.com/btluke/simann1.htm for more information

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Slippery Rock University

See Also:
MetropolisMonteCarloConfirm

Constructor Detail

SimulatedAnnealing

public SimulatedAnnealing(double initTemp,
                          double finalTemp,
                          int iterAtTemp,
                          int maxIter)
Constructor, defaults to a linear cooling schedule.

Parameters:
initTemp - initial temperature of the system
finalTemp - final temperature of the system
iterAtTemp - iterations per temperature
maxIter - the number of different temperatures to try

Constructor

initTemp - initial temperature of the system
finalTemp - final temperature of the system
iterAtTemp - iterations per temperature
maxIter - max total iterations
cooling - the cooling schedule
Method Detail

anneal

public DepotLinkedList anneal(DepotLinkedList mainDepots,
                              SearchStrategy opt)
Deprecated. use the anneal(DepotLinkedList mainDepots, Vector opts) implementation instead

Will run the simulated annealing algorithm

Parameters:
mainDepots - initial solution
opt - the optimization to use for simualted annealing
Returns:
best found solution

anneal

public OptInfo anneal(DepotLinkedList mainDepots,
                      java.util.Vector opts)
Runs the simulated annealing algorithm on the depot linked list using a series of optimizations. Will run the optimizations consecutively, in the order that they are found in the array, for each iteration at each temperature

Parameters:
mainDepots - the depot linked list
opts - the optimizations to run
Returns:
the updated depot linked list
